comment._content: Helen Taft was First Lady of the U.S.: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Taft and their daughter was Helen Taft also: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Taft_Manning the young Tafts went camping in Glacier and met Indians: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9D03E3DB123CE6...
